message.name: ERR_ORG_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: An organization cannot have an empty name. Please enter a valid organization name.
An organisation cannot have an empty name. Please enter a valid organisation name.

message.name: ERR_CURRENCY_FV_BASERATE
message.locale: You cannot set a rate for the base currency.

message.name: ERR_CURRENCY_FV_RATE_INVALID
message.locale: Currency rate must be a value greater than 0.0.

message.name: ERR_CURRENCYEXCHANGE_XFV_FROM_DATE_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Start date is greater than End date. Please ensure that the Start date is before the End date.

message.name: ERR_OFFICE_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A public office cannot have an empty name. Please enter a valid public office name.

message.name: ERR_OFFICE_FV_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: A public office cannot have an empty type. Please enter a valid public office type.
